forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 45. Northeast wind 3 to 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 3 to 13 mph.

weather_report:
As the evening drapes itself over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle tranquility settles in, beckoning those seeking solace from the day. The stars twinkle faintly through a partly cloudy sky, with temperatures nudging down toward a cool 45 degrees, a tender reminder of the chill that comes with the night. The light breeze from the northeast whispers softly, adding to the serene atmosphere, while hints of fog linger near the shoreline, weaving a delicate veil around the Golden Gate Bridge, suggesting a sense of mystery to the coastal landscape.

Tomorrow promises a mostly sunny reprieve with the sun shining on the city, but the usual fall chill will still be present, with afternoon highs easing to around 55. Dressing in layers will be essential—a cozy sweater beneath a light jacket will keep warmth close, while comfortable shoes may encourage leisurely strolls through the city’s iconic streets. As daylight breaks, a walk through Golden Gate Park or perhaps a visit to a quaint café in the Mission District would offer simple joys to savor, creating moments of serene enjoyment amidst the vibrant pulse of San Francisco life.
